labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Nickname becomes left-aligned and string after ", " is on another line.
data.expected_result: Nickname should be centered and on one line.
data.short_description: A nickname of two long strings separated by ", " aligns the nickname to the left and puts it on two different lines.
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your nickname to "longfirstword, longsecondword" - Click on your name in the user list or chat
